alert.note: Alert for Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 9:06PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Areas of Freezing Rain and Snow to Continue Through Midnight Tonight... Precipitation will continue to spread over Saint Lawrence County through the late evening hours. As of 9 PM, temperatures were near to slightly below freezing in many locations, resulting in a mix of wintry precipitation, including freezing rain and snow. Temperatures are expected to warm overnight, changing precipitation to plain rain by around midnight. Until then, light accumulations of snow and ice could make for slick travel, especially for areas from Ogdensburg northward to the international border. Motorists are urged to use caution this evening and remain alert for changing road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
